int target

Detailed Description

Neural network propagated spike.

A propagated spike is an event which generates a new spike in the next output connection.

Author:
Jesus Garrido

Richard Carrillo

Date:
August 2008

int PropagatedSpike::GetTarget (  )  const

It gets the spike source type.

It gets the spike source type.

Returns:
The spike source type: -1->Input spike, -2->Internal spike and >0->Interneurons spike.
